dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noEvents: No events yet. Create your first event to get started!

actions.createEventDescription: Set up a new DJ event

create.title: Create New Event
create.subtitle: Set up your DJ event with all the details
create.hashtagsDescription: Separate with spaces (# will be added automatically)
create.venueDescription: Where will the event take place?
create.paymentDescription: DJ payment information and guest limits
create.guestLimitDescription: Maximum number of guests each DJ can add
create.deadlinesDescription: When do DJs need to submit their materials?
create.timeslotsDescription: Add time slots for each DJ performing at your event

detail.notFoundMessage: The event you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

submissionLinks.title: DJ Submission Links
submissionLinks.description: Share these links with your DJs for them to submit their materials:

detail.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this event? This action cannot be undone. All timeslots and submission links will be removed.
detail.cancelConfirmMessage: This will cancel the event and notify all DJs. The event data will be preserved for records.
detail.cancellationReasonPlaceholder: Explain why the event is being cancelled...

edit.title: Edit Event
edit.subtitle: Update your event details and DJ lineup
edit.timeslotsRequired: At least one DJ timeslot is required
edit.startTimeAfterPrevious: Start time must be after previous slot ends
edit.updateFailed: Failed to update event. Please try again.
edit.eventNotFoundMessage: The event you're trying to edit doesn't exist or you don't have permission to edit it.

djSubmission.title: DJ Submission Form
djSubmission.subtitle: Submit your materials for the upcoming event
djSubmission.invalidLinkMessage: This submission link is invalid or has expired.
djSubmission.promoMaterialsDescription: Upload your promotional materials (images, videos, flyers)
djSubmission.dropFilesHere: Drop your promo materials here or click to browse
djSubmission.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of your promo materials...
djSubmission.guestListDescription: Add your guests for the event
djSubmission.preferDirectContact: I prefer direct contact for transfer arrangements
djSubmission.privacyNotice: Privacy Notice: Your payment information will be encrypted and stored securely. It will only be used for event payment processing and will not be shared with third parties.

success.title: Submission Complete!
success.message: Your materials have been successfully submitted for {eventName}.
steps: The organizer will review your submission
You'll receive confirmation via Instagram DM
Payment will be processed after the event

mobileGuidance.title: üì± Mobile Users:
mobileGuidance.message: If redirected to Instagram app, tap "Open in Browser" or use a desktop browser for best results.

errors.configuration: There is a problem with the server configuration.
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to sign in.
errors.verification: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
errors.default: An unexpected error occurred during authentication.

validation.invalidInstagram: Instagram handle must start with @ and contain only letters, numbers, dots, and underscores
validation.timeRange: End time must be after start time
validation.dateInPast: Date cannot be in the past
validation.deadlineAfterEvent: Deadline must be before the event date
validation.promoBeforeGuest: Promo materials deadline must be before guest list deadline
validation.fileTooLarge: File {filename} is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}.

eventStatus.urgentBanner: This event is happening today! Make sure all preparations are complete.
eventStatus.confirmActionMessage: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

consentBanner.message: We use analytics to improve your experience and understand how you use RITE. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies and data collection.
